sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from "react"; import Card from "../../../UI/Card/Card"; import SubTitle from "../../../UI/SubTitle/SubTitle"; import style from "./AccountCard.module.css"; import ExpenseDataContext from "../../../../store/expenseData/expenseData--context"; import timeObj from "../../../assets/timeObj/timeObj"; const { TODAY, YEAR, MONTH, DAY } = timeObj; const test = [ { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "food", subCate: "breakfast", time: "2021-08-05", year: "2021", month: "08", day: "05", description: "Burger", price: "50", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "food", subCate: "breakfast", time: "2021-09-05", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "05", description: "Burger", price: "50", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "food", subCate: "breakfast", time: "2021-09-01", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "01", description: "Burger", price: "50", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "clothing", subCate: "t-shirt", time: "2021-09-02", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "02", description: "Nike", price: "100", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "housing", subCate: "bill", time: "2021-09-03", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "03", description: "June Bill", price: "500", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "transportation", subCate: "bus", time: "2021-09-04", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "04", description: "bus", price: "10", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "income", mainCate: "salary", subCate: "salary", time: "2021-09-05", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "05", description: "salary", price: "3000", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "housing", subCate: "bill", time: "2021-09-08", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "08", description: "", price: "500", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "food", subCate: "dinner", time: "2021-09-01", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "01", description: "Burger", price: "110", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "income", mainCate: "stock", subCate: "stock", time: "2021-09-04", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "04", description: "AMZN", price: "100", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "education", subCate: "book", time: "2021-09-06", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "06", description: "", price: "50", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "income", mainCate: "salary", subCate: "salary", time: "2021-09-06", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "06", description: "", price: "1000", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "expense", mainCate: "entertainment", subCate: "video games", time: "2021-09-06", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "06", description: "Burger", price: "110", }, { id: uuidv4(), category: "income", mainCate: "bonus", subCate: "bonus", time: "2021-09-06", year: "2021", month: "09", day: "06", description: "", price: "500", }, ]; function AccountCard() { const { expenseData } = useContext(ExpenseDataContext); const accIncome = expenseData .filter( (expenseData) => expenseData.category === "income" && Number(new Date(expenseData.time)) <= Number(TODAY) ) .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + Number(cur.price), 0); const accIncome1 = expenseData .filter( (expenseData) => expenseData.category === "income" && expenseData.year <= YEAR && expenseData.month <= MONTH && expenseData.day <= DAY ) .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + Number(cur.price), 0); console.log(accIncome, accIncome1); const accExpense = expenseData .filter( (expenseData) => expenseData.category === "expense" && Number(new Date(expenseData.time)) <= Number(TODAY) ) .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + Number(cur.price), 0); return (
income {`$${accIncome}`} expense {`$${accExpense}`} net {`$${ accIncome - accExpense }`}
); } export default AccountCard;
